Title: Monsters University
Writer: Dan Scanlon (story by), Daniel Gerson (story by), Robert L. Baird (story by), Daniel Gerson (screenplay by), Robert L. Baird (screenplay by), Dan Scanlon (screenplay by), Adrian Molina (additional screenplay material by)
Actors: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Steve Buscemi, Helen Mirren
Plot: A look at the relationship between Mike and Sulley during their days at Monsters University -- when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 9 wins & 56 nominations.
